name: Daughter
description:
DAUGHTER v0.01a

Thanks for checking out my demo for Dream Diary Jam 5, I hope you enjoy it! Please let me know of any bugs you come across by contacting me on tumblr edevweiss.tumblr.com or in the comments :)

Daughter is a traditional yume nikki fangame demo, starring Edel, an old lady who lives alone and refuses to enter the rooms of her home besides her own. You may explore her dreams while she waits for her family to visit her. 

As you explore her dreams, you can collect effects that will help you go deeper. In this version, no endings are available yet but you'll be able to collect 5 effects.

Content warnings: As of this release, this game contains mild splatter and mild artsy nudity. 

This game will imply some dark subjects like parental abuse and death. More specific triggers will come as I complete the game. Please be careful!
